ssot__SMSPublication__dlm.name: SMS Publication
ssot__SMSPublication__dlm.description: The SMS Publication DMO represents the process that sends out a set of text (SMS) messages to multiple recipients.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date when the record was created.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID to a logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by External Record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID to the logical name of the object where the record originated, for example a cloud storage file or another connector’s external object.

ssot__Description__c.description: A description of the SMS publication.

ssot__DurationSecondsQty__c.description: The number of seconds related to the message.

ssot__EnagementAssetId__c.description: A reference ID to the engagement asset.

ssot__EnagementAssetContentId__c.description: A reference ID to the engagement asset content.

ssot__EngagementChannelTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to the type of engagement channel.

ssot__EngagementPublicationNbr__c.description: The number or identifier of an engagement publication.

ssot__EngagementPublicationStatusId__c.description: A reference ID to the status of the engagement publication.

ssot__EnagementPublicationTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to the type of engagement publication.

ssot__EngagementTopicGroupId__c.description: A reference ID to a group of engagement topics.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID for an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__Name__c.description: The name of the SMS publication.

ssot__ParentEngagementPublicationId__c.description: A reference ID to the parent record’s engagement publication.

ssot__PublicationAttemptsNbr__c.description: The number of attempts to send the publication.

ssot__SendClassificationId__c.description: A reference ID to how consent is checked for example transactional or commercial.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the SMS Publication DMO.

ssot__TotalPublicationItemsCt__c.description: The total number of publication items.
